SummarySection.title: Summary
SummarySection.summary: Front-end Developer with over 2 years of experience in building modern, responsive, and high-performance interfaces for web and mobile applications. Proficient in technologies such as React, Next.js, React Native, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and TanStack Query, with solid experience in integrating RESTful APIs. Skilled in version control best practices using Git and familiar with agile methodologies like Scrum, contributing effectively to cross-functional teams.

80lines.jobDescription:
I joined 80 Lines as a trainee front-end developer, where I had the opportunity to learn from highly skilled mentors. These mentorships were essential to my technical and professional growth, allowing me to progress to a junior developer position within just a few months.
As a junior developer, I worked on multiple projects simultaneously, including the development of the company’s institutional website, as well as administrative, financial, and e-commerce systems. This experience helped me sharpen key skills such as problem-solving, effective time management, and teamwork.
My dedication and ability to consistently deliver results led to a promotion to mid-level developer. In this new role, I took on more complex responsibilities and became one of the company’s lead front-end developers.

neoris.jobDescription: I started my professional career at NEORIS as a SAP trainee developer. This role was a key entry point into the job market and allowed me to gain foundational knowledge of the technology sector. During my time at the company, I worked on both front-end and back-end development, gaining broad and practical experience across all stages of system development and maintenance.

EducationSection.title: Education
EducationSection.courseSummary: Bachelor’s degree focused on preparing professionals to analyze, design, develop, implement, and manage information systems. The program combines technology, business, and problem-solving, providing a broad set of skills in computing and management processes.
